reviews.text: Very beautiful environment for our celebration. All details taken care of by email with Brigitte was smooth and easy. All guests raved of the space, food and service. I picked it due to a work training in Mill Room and knew I would want to visit again. Many stop ins for restaurant as well that has never disappointed.

This little restaurant is perfect. Everything was really good!! The pulled pork mac and cheese üòç The pretzels are to die for too.. literally. There‚Äôs pool and slot machines. The live music was really great too!!

Was out with a couple of friends & we stopped at Dew Drop Inn. Pretty cool rustic interior. We had some bourbon sampling & shared boneless buffalo wings. The bourbon was good , the wings were good , & the service was good. Couldn't ask for much more...

We hosted my step-son and bride‚Äôs rehearsal dinner at Dew Drop and worked with the coordinator, Brigitte. She catered to all our needs and communicated in a very timely manner. We hosted 50 guests in the event room/bar downstairs was perfect for our party.  The guests devoured the delicious appetizers and we offered 3 dinner plates options of artichoke stuffed chicken, pork loin, and prime rib, which was a hit. I would 100% recommend working with Brigitte for your catering needs.

Had a baby shower in the Mill room and it turned out great!! The staff were friendly and professional. Brigitte was very helpful and easy to work with. The food was perfect and my guests bragged about the set up. The snow was shoveled to make access to the building safe. I will be using them again!!

issues: Mobile performance data unavailable - API configuration required
recommendations: Configure Google PageSpeed Insights API for mobile analysis
Test website on mobile devices manually

recentReviews.text: I had the brisket melt and it was really good. They have the best oni9n rings and mushrooms I've ever had. Get the bacon aoili sauce for tye onion rings and the green bean sauce for the mushrooms. It's a horseradish based sauce. I've never got anything that wasn't good.

Brigitte was amazing and such a pleasure to work with.  Helped with large party catering event, suggested a variety of options, and the end result was a diverse menu that pleases everyone!
I highly recommend The Dew Drop Inn and Brigitte as you guide for your catering events!
Cassie is the best server!  We only go when she is working because she is that awesome!!  The food is always very good!  We enjoy going to The Dew Drop!
Loads of room for a lot of people, great outdoor space for kids to run around, the soft pretzel and shoestring fries were our favorites today

We hosted my step-son and bride‚Äôs rehearsal dinner at Dew Drop and worked with the coordinator, Brigitte. She catered to all our needs and communicated in a very timely manner. We hosted 50 guests in the event room/bar downstairs was perfect for our party.  The guests devoured the delicious appetizers and we offered 3 dinner plates options of artichoke stuffed chicken, pork loin, and prime rib, which was a hit. I would 100% recommend working with Brigitte for your catering needs.

I had my wedding and reception there, From the very beginning there, I worked with BRIGITTE from day one, and let me tell you SHE IS ABSOLUTELY AMAZING, SHE goes above and beyond! She is the sweetest person and she put up with ALL MY QUESTIONS, She was very prompt, knowledgeable and caring, She took me step by step on every process, She informed me on anything that I forgot or if I needed anything and Even suggested things due to I was VERY VERY OVERWHELMED! And It was such a huge help! she is amazing! the day came and I WAS LATE! And she WAS ABSOLUTELY AMAZING WITH A HUGE SMILE ON HER FACE, and what a blessing it was to see that walking in the door, My husband said she was amazing from the time he walked in as well, I cannot express enough If you need a place to have your WEDDING, RECEPTION, or BOTH PLEASE CONTACT BRIGITTE, She will help you every step of the way, or if you need ‚Äú THE MILL ROOM‚Äù for anything like Christmas party, anniversary party, they do it all down there . give Brigitte a call. you will NOT regret it! Brigitte Thank you from the bottom of Our Hearts, We will definitely be back to see you and have lunch and dinner ! üíöüß°ü´∂üèª

Stephanie and William

detailedReviews.author: sandy craig
detailedReviews.text: I had the brisket melt and it was really good. They have the best oni9n rings and mushrooms I've ever had. Get the bacon aoili sauce for tye onion rings and the green bean sauce for the mushrooms. It's a horseradish based sauce. I've never got anything that wasn't good.

detailedReviews.author: Mari Bayers
detailedReviews.text:
Brigitte was amazing and such a pleasure to work with.  Helped with large party catering event, suggested a variety of options, and the end result was a diverse menu that pleases everyone!
I highly recommend The Dew Drop Inn and Brigitte as you guide for your catering events!

detailedReviews.author: Donna Shain
detailedReviews.text: Cassie is the best server!  We only go when she is working because she is that awesome!!  The food is always very good!  We enjoy going to The Dew Drop!

detailedReviews.author: Anthony Rulo
detailedReviews.text: Great Food and Service

detailedReviews.author: Jimbo Collins
detailedReviews.text: Loads of room for a lot of people, great outdoor space for kids to run around, the soft pretzel and shoestring fries were our favorites today

detailedReviews.author: Joanna Tudor
detailedReviews.text: We hosted my step-son and bride‚Äôs rehearsal dinner at Dew Drop and worked with the coordinator, Brigitte. She catered to all our needs and communicated in a very timely manner. We hosted 50 guests in the event room/bar downstairs was perfect for our party.  The guests devoured the delicious appetizers and we offered 3 dinner plates options of artichoke stuffed chicken, pork loin, and prime rib, which was a hit. I would 100% recommend working with Brigitte for your catering needs.

detailedReviews.author: Stephanie F
detailedReviews.text:
I had my wedding and reception there, From the very beginning there, I worked with BRIGITTE from day one, and let me tell you SHE IS ABSOLUTELY AMAZING, SHE goes above and beyond! She is the sweetest person and she put up with ALL MY QUESTIONS, She was very prompt, knowledgeable and caring, She took me step by step on every process, She informed me on anything that I forgot or if I needed anything and Even suggested things due to I was VERY VERY OVERWHELMED! And It was such a huge help! she is amazing! the day came and I WAS LATE! And she WAS ABSOLUTELY AMAZING WITH A HUGE SMILE ON HER FACE, and what a blessing it was to see that walking in the door, My husband said she was amazing from the time he walked in as well, I cannot express enough If you need a place to have your WEDDING, RECEPTION, or BOTH PLEASE CONTACT BRIGITTE, She will help you every step of the way, or if you need ‚Äú THE MILL ROOM‚Äù for anything like Christmas party, anniversary party, they do it all down there . give Brigitte a call. you will NOT regret it! Brigitte Thank you from the bottom of Our Hearts, We will definitely be back to see you and have lunch and dinner ! üíöüß°ü´∂üèª

Stephanie and William

detailedReviews.author: Anthony Accardi
detailedReviews.text:
What an amazing place. We were there for a wedding and it was a great atmosphere with amazing staff. Big shoutout to day of coordinator Brigitte.

Venue was absolutely beautiful and staff helped everything run smoothly. Definitely 10/10 recommendation.

detailedReviews.author: Ron Tucker
detailedReviews.text: I placed a to-go order through the Dew Drop app for a couple of burgers and sides. Within minutes, I got a text letting me know my food was ready‚Äîplus, I was pleasantly surprised with a 30% discount. The burgers were delicious, the sides were tasty, and the staff was friendly and helpful.

detailedReviews.author: Tracy Adams
detailedReviews.text: Beer was cold, waitress was great. Portions were disappointing and kitchen left off several ingredients from both sandwich wa ordered. When menus says BIG spicy Cuban, you expect more than 2oz of pulled pork for the price.

detailedReviews.author: Stephanie Gibson
detailedReviews.text: Went tonight and will NEVER be back. Took 20 mins to get a drink. Well over 45 mins for food. Then we got it in shifts. Got our order wrong. No onions, onions were on it. Salad asked before wings. Didn‚Äôt even get the salad till after the dinner was served. Never got a refill. All dishes were dirty. There was not excuse for service like this. Your staff have to be the most disrespectful snobby staff I have ever had the pleasure to be ‚Äòserved‚Äô by???? Brooklyn A was rude. Also they don‚Äôt have child menus‚Ä¶. That‚Äôs what were we were told.

detailedReviews.author: Warren Robinson
detailedReviews.text:
Just walked out. After 45 minutes we had two flat beers and two bloody Mary‚Äôs we‚Äôre not even started. One star for the server only because that was the lowest possible.
Was our first trip. Won‚Äôt be back and don‚Äôt recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Danielle Ryan
detailedReviews.text:
The Dew Drop is one of our favorite places!
I worked with Brigette to book the Mill room event space as well as the outdoor area for our wedding. The entire staff and Brigette were amazing to work with! They made sure we had everything we needed, and made the day flow seamlessly. I would absolutely recommend working with her to book a party or wedding! And the food was amazing as well!

detailedReviews.author: Marti Gurley
detailedReviews.text: I reserved The Mill Room for my wedding on extremely short notice. Brigitte was so easy to work with and had everything set up and ready for us to decorate. She was every attentive and responded to any questions I had immediately. The food was so good, just as we have always experienced, and our wedding was absolutely perfect!

detailedReviews.author: Carrie Clifton
detailedReviews.text: Brigitte was a ROCK STAR!! She helped me make John‚Äôs surprise 60th at The Mill Room absolutely seamless.    Communication was clear &  timelines Our guests are still raving, and I actually got to enjoy the night because everything was in expert hands. Couldn‚Äôt recommend The Mill Room more!‚Äù

detailedReviews.author: Lorna Melton
detailedReviews.text: Good food. Big variety. Friendly place.

detailedReviews.author: Scott Mcdaniel
detailedReviews.text: Really laid back hometown place.  Everyone was very welcoming.  Can't wait to stop back by on our next road trip.

detailedReviews.author: Chris Albright
detailedReviews.text: Cool place good food

detailedReviews.author: Marcy Sansone
detailedReviews.text: So good it has a little something for everyone

detailedReviews.author: Pamela Brinegar
detailedReviews.text: We rented The Mill Room for our daughter‚Äôs 30th birthday party. It was the perfect venue for our event!  The room is BEAUTIFUL and the service was outstanding!  Brigette was very attentive with all the pre-party planning and very helpful in answering all our questions. We will definitely be using this space in the future and highly recommend it for others!

detailedReviews.author: Joan Capriglione
detailedReviews.text: Was there twice and both times order was wrong and continued to ask for condiments that we never got.  Fun place cold beer crappy service.  Wont be back

detailedReviews.author: Lejla Markley
detailedReviews.text: We hosted a celebration of life for my father in law at the dew drop inn in their ‚Äúmill room‚Äù every step of the process was made so easy thanks to Brigette. She communicated and responded quickly to any and all the questions I had. Upon arrival we were happy to find the mill room had a separate entrance so we didn‚Äôt have to walk thru the main entrance of the restaurant. The space was absolutely beautiful and there was lots of room for our guests to enjoy. We had food catered by the dew drop and it was delicious. We will absolutely be using the dew drop for all of our future events. I cannot recommend this place enough! Amazing job to our bartender and again to Brigette for such an incredible service!

detailedReviews.author: Krislyn Craig
detailedReviews.text: We used the Mill Room today for our daughter and son in laws bridal shower.  The food was amazing, and our bartender, Gabriel Bova, did an outstanding job!!!!!!

detailedReviews.author: chad allison
detailedReviews.text: Great service great atmosphere food was lackluster. Maybe the chef was having a bad night. I would definitely give it a second shot.

detailedReviews.author: Jes B.
detailedReviews.text: Great service, food and drinks!

detailedReviews.author: Ron Kramer
detailedReviews.text: Good local brews

detailedReviews.author: Todd Hulen
detailedReviews.text: Great food and atmosphere. Our server, Julie, took great care of our group after a day of golf. Great service!!

detailedReviews.author: Brad Campbell
detailedReviews.text: Cute little place I wish I lived closer to it. Dining room was pretty full and the server gave us great service. Food was great, tacos were huge and their wing sauce is great

detailedReviews.author: Amanda Shinabargar
detailedReviews.text: The waitress julie was great at costumer service, the food was great.

detailedReviews.author: Christy Henry
detailedReviews.text: They catered brunch and appetizers for my daughter‚Äôs wedding. It was all delicious!! The quesadillas were by far the biggest hit!! Would highly recommend!!! Brigitte was wonderful to work with and made sure everything was on time and exactly as we discussed!!

detailedReviews.author: Jay Crabtree
detailedReviews.text: Great food! Gotta try the deep fried ribs!

detailedReviews.author: Krysten Freund
detailedReviews.text: Bridget was absolutely fantastic to work with, as always. We have booked the Mill Room for many occasions and the service has always been top tier!

detailedReviews.author: Diane Edwards
detailedReviews.text: The Mill Room was the perfect venue for our family reunion. Bruce and Sheila were very helpful when we were setting up and Gabe, our bartender for our reunion was awesome. The outdoor game area was so much fun. Everyone was helpful, friendly and fun. Will definitely consider using this place again.

detailedReviews.author: Mike Sherfy
detailedReviews.text: Ate at the cozy and it was amazing as well as the staff. Have never had a bad meal there.

detailedReviews.author: Cindy Moore
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic venue for a corporate meeting! The food was absolutely delicious and there was more than enough for everyone. The service was impeccable‚Äîhuge thanks to Brigitte for planning the perfect event. Everything ran smoothly and exceeded expectations!

detailedReviews.author: Larry Shobe
detailedReviews.text:
Bar tenders/servers all first class. Food exceptable
For bar food. Clean nice place!

detailedReviews.author: Daniel Mays
detailedReviews.text: The air conditioning doesn‚Äôt seem to be working. They were out of ribs. The food‚Äôs pretty good service was very slow. Only one person working the floor air conditioning didn‚Äôt seem to be working. I had one beer and left. They used to be better than this.

detailedReviews.author: Julie Cage
detailedReviews.text: We were a party of 4 on a Sunday evening. Several folks were there, as well as one large party and the band was setting up around 6ish. I tried the jackfruit burger on a whim and it was great! Others had the three pigs, brisket, pulled pork. Shoestring fries were good (super hot and quite salty). Atmosphere was nice for a Sunday afternoon!

detailedReviews.author: Riley
detailedReviews.text: The ribs and wings were ok.  Neither were great.  The brisket was so dry to the point of inedible.  I had the tornado alley brew.  Also pretty disappointed.  The location seems right and the character of the place has a good vibe.  I just wish the fare was better.  Not returning anytime soon.

detailedReviews.author: VLA Layne
detailedReviews.text: This is such a cute place to stop by for a burger and beer. The staff are very friendly and they have live music. I had a warm goat cheese app and pizza which was very tasty.

detailedReviews.author: Becky Anderson
detailedReviews.text: While my husband and I eat at The Kozy and The Dew Drop frequently, I actually would like to specifically call out The Mill Room. We held my daughter‚Äòs reception here on July 5 and invited close to 80 people. It was hot as Hades outside but inside it was nice and cool as was all the help! Bridget, who helped coordinate the event with us, couldn‚Äôt have been better. Through the entire process, she responded when I reached out and was a great at recommending vendors or Assistance when we needed it. While the space was a little tight for nearly 80 people at 10 tables the buffet worked out really well. We had an open bar, an insured that all of the top brand liquors we wanted and beers were available. Every guest raved about the food. They said the brisket and mac & cheese was the best they had had anywhere. They were even able to adjust one of the entr√©es to our liking due to food intolerance issues.One of our friends who is really critical of food in general said it had to be one of the best meals he‚Äôs ever eaten at a wedding reception ever. The decorating vendor that Bridget recommended was also great to work with. They worked together so that when we walked into the space, it was just beautiful! But I have to say the space is gorgeous all on its own. I would highly recommend hosting your next event here!

detailedReviews.author: Sam
detailedReviews.text: This little restaurant is perfect. Everything was really good!! The pulled pork mac and cheese üòç The pretzels are to die for too.. literally. There‚Äôs pool and slot machines. The live music was really great too!!

detailedReviews.author: Paul Kaus
detailedReviews.text: What a great place to bring a group. Our Corvette Club 20 members met there after visiting the National Viet Nam Memorial in Perryville. The service and food was excellent. Our waiters were fast and courteous. This was our second visit and I‚Äôm sure we will do it again!

detailedReviews.author: Sarah Hamilton
detailedReviews.text: Had my mother's 75th Birthday party at the Dew Drop. Brigitte was great and answered all my questions about the food menu and the room availability. Keeping me in the loop and making sure I had everything I needed. The food was fantastic. Every one loved the pizza!! Gabe and the other staff was amazing tending to the guest the day of the event!!

detailedReviews.author: Mike Bracken
detailedReviews.text: Cozy is our favorite

detailedReviews.author: Suzan Ponder-Bates
detailedReviews.text: The food is always good!  Love the atmosphere, but the live music was so loud it was hard to converse with our table mates.

detailedReviews.author: Sandy Sumski
detailedReviews.text:
We have had several reunions at the Dew Drop Inn.  Bridgette was very helpful in coordinating everything.  Food and service were great.
Will definitely return.

detailedReviews.author: Christy G.
detailedReviews.text:
Stopped off for a bite to eat while out for a ride today (2022). Food was your typical bar fare. Really enjoyed the pretzels that we had as an appetizer. Staff was friendly and prompt even though the place had a decent crowd for a mid after noon. We'll most likely stop off here again when out riding.
(2025) We were camping in the area and wanted to head out for a meal to escape the heat a bit. Stopped for an early-ish dinner around 5. There was a minimal crowd and we were able to find a table right away. Staff was amazingly friendly (again) and very apologetic when they were out of the beer my hubby wanted. We ordered drinks, and meals which were prepared well and brought out promptly. We've been here a handful of times now, and it has become our go-to spot to stop if we're in the area because we know we can count on decent food, reasonable prices, and great service.

detailedReviews.author: Don Millard
detailedReviews.text: Good atmosphere with good food and friendly service.

detailedReviews.author: Kayla Ricks
detailedReviews.text:
Dew Point was alright. The food was hit or miss. The bbq sauce and bbq nachos were really great. Everything else was just okay.

The service was wasn't "bad" but we did feel somewhat unwelcome: table was dirty,  drinks took a while, didn't get some things asked for and had to retrieve them ourselves. They weren't packed or crowded but could have been low on staff.

They have a nice area outside to play outdoor games:chess, connect 4, etc.

detailedReviews.author: Alan Kania
detailedReviews.text: Very friendly

detailedReviews.author: Bronson G
detailedReviews.text: Kayla made the experience great! We had a group of 8 and she was very attentive and patient with us as we waited for some of party. Food was excellent and fresh with our group.  Beong from Houston, this was an great choice for dinner. Can't wait to come back!

detailedReviews.author: Laura Lindsey
detailedReviews.text: This is the 2nd time that we've had a bad experience here.We ordered a grilled(unbreaded)chicken sandwich and it's obvious that's not what we got. 3 of us ordered lemon with our drinks(we asked 3 times),finally my husband went to the bar and got them. The waitress snipped at my grandson and told him to speak up,very rudely. There is so much more that I could post but I won't. This will probably be our last time

detailedReviews.author: City Sergeant
detailedReviews.text: Great food, good prices, beautiful drive.

detailedReviews.author: Cindy Mansker
detailedReviews.text:
I was put in charge of reserving space for a very downsized ‚Äúfamily reunion‚Äù. It was all set and 2 evenings before I realized I gave her the wrong date,  with panic setting in I reached out to Brigitte through text and she responded within minutes confirming I did indeed provide the incorrect date, but not to worry that she would make sure we were accommodated. We gathered in the Dew Drop and it was perfect. The food was delicious and our waitress was top notch.
Looking forward to our next visit.
Cindy M.

detailedReviews.author: Zachary Welch
detailedReviews.text: Just pick something else

detailedReviews.author: Cgtjr Tucker
detailedReviews.text: Last September, I reserved the Mill Room, and I recently reserved the ‚Äúpatio‚Äù at the Dew Drop Inn for an event, and Brigitte( who is in charge of booking special events) was more than exceptional in getting me the correct information that I needed, in a timely manner, in order for me to plan for both events, and I couldn‚Äôt be happier with her work!

detailedReviews.author: Jeannine Canaday
detailedReviews.text: Brigette was very helpful planning luncheon after our daughter‚Äôs funeral. It was a difficult time and she showed grace with a delicate situation. We much appreciate her thoughtfulness.

detailedReviews.author: Patrick Drury
detailedReviews.text: We had a gathering for about 70 in the Mill Room. Had to throw it all together on a tight timeline. Brigitte was responsive, accommodating, and quickly made it an easy button for us

detailedReviews.author: Knk Knk
detailedReviews.text: I eat here often. I meet a friend for lunch here all the time. We typically have Sarah or Cassie help us and both of them are great. We enjoy going up to see them. I almost always get a smash burger because I know I‚Äôll be good. I have had the pizza once which was also good.

detailedReviews.author: Thresa Sansoucie
detailedReviews.text: We had a rehearsal dinner here and had a large group. Brigitte was excellent to work with. Staff was fantastic and easy to work with. Everyone loved the food. Highly recommended. We were very happy with our service. Thank you Brigitte and to small the staff. The Sansoucie Family

detailedReviews.author: Teri Bloom
detailedReviews.text:
One again, great food, amazing service. Tina is great, she deserves a raise.

Love to eat here however, I absolutely hate having to wipe my hands dry on my clothing or not wash my hands in the restroom. Those air things pick up germs from the room and I do not want that on my hands.

detailedReviews.author: Edward Bohley
detailedReviews.text: Music was bit strong,,,but, overall was great

detailedReviews.author: tracy niznik Perkins
detailedReviews.text: Good food. Cool place. Good service

detailedReviews.author: Maggie Craig
detailedReviews.text: Brigitte and the team at the Dew Drop Mill Room/ Pavilion made our 80‚Äôs themed wedding reception all the more merry! We had constant communication, every question I asked was answered, all the prices were upfront, and the food ans drinks were so affordable. We had an absolute blast and it was all made possible by Brigitte and her team!! We will definitely host at the dew drop again!

detailedReviews.author: Nicole Pulido
detailedReviews.text: Awesome little hangout not far from the highway. üëçüòé If you're not looking for bar and grill fare, try the Kozy right around back. üòã There is something for everyone in the family. üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß‚Äçüë¶ Great outdoor space as well! üå≥üå≤

detailedReviews.author: Scotty Roth
detailedReviews.text: The Dew Drop texted me a 25% off coupon for being a veteran and and in honoring memorial day i was happy 2 bring 3 other couples with for there 1st time. Everyone had a great experience. Good Food!

detailedReviews.author: Steven Schilli
detailedReviews.text: Madison was great. She does not tend bar. She is a real bar tender.best service you can get.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.6/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise Brigitte for her exceptional service and coordination skills, making events seamless and enjoyable. - review management can highlight this positive aspect

The Dew Drop Inn's food, including unique offerings like the brisket melt and onion rings with specialty sauces, receives high praise for taste and variety. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The venue's spaciousness and beautiful event spaces, such as The Mill Room and outdoor areas, are perfect for weddings and large gatherings. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
improvementOpportunities: Long wait times and incorrect orders - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Negative reviews and reputation issues - review management can address this concern
Lack of atmosphere/ambiance awareness - social media marketing can improve this area

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
